entry.title: About Kanbai
entry.content:
â€œConsciousness is an illimitable power.â€

In other words consciousness is an illimitable power, and though at times it may seem to be all consciousness of misery, yet in the way it propagates itself from wave to wave, so that we never cease to feel, though at moments we appear to, try to, pray to, there is something that holds one in oneâ€™s place, makes it a standpoint in the universe which it is probably good not to forsake
â€”â€” Henry James
